main event: A UFO was observed over Weldon Springs, Missouri, on September 9, 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as round, lighted, and moving at high speed before vanishing suddenly., The sighting lasted approximately 20 minutes., A witness reported the object giving off a very bright light that cast shadows as it passed overhead., The object's estimated size was between 40 to 80 feet in length., No photographs or physical evidence could be found related to the sighting.
witness description: A 54-year-old male described seeing the object which remained stationary for minutes before accelerating silently.
